text: War against the Demon Ravana was looked at as the only solution
Vibhishana the disgruntled brother of the Demon,
also joins hands with Rama Sainiya.
Headed by Hanuman,
The Vanara Sainiya  makes a bridge of stones that float on the sea.
Led by Ram and Lakshman,
Hanuman's Vanara Sainiya start their journey for war against Lanka.
Rama Sainiya meets withhelding success to start with killing Kumbakarna
and many Stalwarts the Demon ought.
But Indrajith in an unlawful Manner,
uses a amodha power against Laxmana and renders him unconscious.
At Rama's camp, everybody is concerned.
Only the Sanjivini herb from Dronachila mountain
has the power to cure Lakshmana
The herb glows only in night,
and therefore has be brought before day dawns.
My Lord this is not a stumbling block in your noble mission
Kindly bless me to be the stepping stone,
I shall do my duty.
Hanuman you are my grace,
you will accomplish my perceptions.
It is late evening and Hanuman is airborne.
Ravana watches him fly from his balcony.
Sooriya devaaa
Go back to the Horizon advice immediately.
You shall not set until I tell you.
But you know, I just set a few hours ago,
To raise immediately,
is creating imbalance in the atmosphere.
You are teasing me, Suriya...
Do what I say?
As Hanuman flies in the moonlight,
Sun starts to show step in the east.
So, Ravana has compelled my guru Suriya Deva to raise.
Surya Gurudeva...
Is it at the bayest of Ravana...
that you were chosen to do the strange double duty?
Hanuman you know better.
I am helpless.
Am I hearing this from my in the inimitable Guruji,
who energise this hemisphere day in and day out.
Guruji, I will keep you out of this predicament.
But you have to bear with me for the service of Sri Ram.
Saying this Hanuman bows to the sun,
Saying this Hanuman bows to the sun,
plucks him as he did when he was a kid
Of course in moonlight,
without the traces of Sun.
Hanuman sails over Dronachal,
Hanuman sails over Dronachal,
All herbs that glitter are not Sanjivini.
Let me not miss time in searching
Let me not miss time in searching
At the Warship,
who opens his eyes and smiles at Ram.
who opens his eyes and smiles at Ram.
You are the person in times of need.
the Samay Sanjeevini...
Lord, I have a unfinished agenda.
Lord, I have a unfinished agenda.
Hey, Simhamuga Rakshasas - all seven of you
Encircle this creature flying in the air with a mountain in his hand,
grab him for breath and kill him.
grab him for breath and kill him.
Eheha ha ahhahahhahaha
ehahahahha
I have a mountain on one hand and my debarred Guruji on the other.
I am unable to give you my full hospitality.
Please be content with this and vanish.
Please be content with this and vanish.
Pardon me for taking your breath off.
Here I go
Dronachal mountain is placed back.
Hanuman stands in the Sky,
and joins his hands saluting Surya Deva.
The sun appears from behind his arms and gets into the horizon.
The day dawns
